message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $17000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another move. I can offer it to you for $16500. This is my final concession. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $13000 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close. I'm willing to make one more move. I can offer it to you for $15800. This is my last offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your last offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $12500 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I'm not willing to go any lower than this. I can offer it to you for $14000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $13250. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
